body:
The husband deserves a better wife, a better son and a better daughter. Also, what the fuck were these last pages. "They love each other so everyone is a friend now." What the fuck did she do for the son to just decide to go to school? He should have committed suicide from shame, instead. And the daughter, ahe should have been raped in that alley or whatever that shit is called.
Fuck, I fucking hated the shit. This deserves a fucking 0/10. Fucking kill me.

Day 53 - 1298*
Son of a mother fucking bitch. The story was absolute shit. Fucking kill me.
First, they marry each other after knowing each other for three months. Three Fucking Months. Then, the same day that they marry, the husband goes away. Then, she just starts masturbating in the living room, is she stupid? Then, the daughter is a fucking hypocrite. "Men are beast that only think about sex. Blah blah blah, man are bad" and then the first thing that she does is fuck her mom. And the end, don't even make me start talking about it. First we have the husband that got cheated on and still accepts his wife. The wife was fucking at least four guys when he came home and without even understanding who he was, the wife just decided to fuck him. "But the wife is the victim here", really? She decided to keep fucking her son in law and then everything escalated from there. The wife deserves to die, the son deserves to die, the daughter deserves to die, the four guys deserve to die and...
I remmeber reading this on hentai nexus and getting triggered. now im okay.
First wholesome ending ntr ive ever seen
The husband is the GOAT he still loves his wife even if he got ntred
@DekuMidoriyaIzuku only cuck soy boys do that 😂 and plan to get MaRrIEd 😂
Well mind break with happy ending? That's legendary rare
Masato knew his wife was a slut and fucked many people and got her mind broken. But he still accepted her and made her normal. Be like Masato.
Good on the husband, must guys would have just divorse the slut and trow her out the window
He cleansed the NTR'd wifey. This is it, chief. This is the one.
happy ending in every sense in that family :v
Un-mindbreaking his wife with the power of love (and cock)? Now thats something you don't see often!
This was actually the first NTR manga I've ever read and probably the only one I read that had a good ending. Good times.
